about_title: Trading platform Binarium provides professional services since 2012. The experience, accumulated during the work, allowed the company to supply traders from all corners of the world with everything that is necessary for comfortable trading.
about_text-1: The intuitively accessible interface of our platform and site will allow you to understand the underlying nuances of trading in the shortest possible time. Even a novice investor will not experience problems with the adaptation to the new trading floor.
about_text-2: Withdrawal applications are processed promptly, and the advanced trading platform is regularly updated, which allows the immediate opening of transactions without gapping. Binarium is a client-oriented broker, so, first of all, everything is done for your comfort.
asset-catalog_text-EUR/GBP: The ratio is in such an order: the exchange rate of the pound sterling (GBP) for the euro (EUR). EUR/GBP is a cross-rate where the accounting unit is the British pound (GBP).
asset-catalog_text-EUR/USD: Euro (currency symbol - EUR) is the official currency for 17 countries of the Eurozone. Besides, it is used in 9 other countries. Eurocurrency has the largest monetary base in the world, even greater than the US dollar. The EUR / USD currency pair is a direct quotation, where the payment for the European currency is made by the US dollar.
asset-catalog_text-GBP/USD: The British pound or simply pound (currency symbol - GBP) is the national currency of the United Kingdom, as well as a legal mean of payment for the Falkland, St. Helena and Ascension Islands, as well as Tristan da Cunha and Gibraltar as UK overseas territories. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the US dollar is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-GBP/RUB: The British pound or simply pound (currency symbol - GBP) is the national currency of the United Kingdom, as well as a legal mean of payment for the Falkland, St. Helena and Ascension Islands, as well as Tristan da Cunha and Gibraltar as UK overseas territories. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the Russian rouble is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-NZD/USD: The New Zealand dollar (currency symbol - NZD) is the official currency of New Zealand, Niue, Cook Islands, Tokelau, and Pitcairn. Also, this currency is called "Kiwi" - this is a kind of bird and one of the symbols of New Zealand. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the US dollar (USD) is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-USD/CHF: Swiss franc (currency symbol - CHF) - is a payment instrument of Switzerland and Liechtenstein. Monetary units are issued by the central bank of Switzerland. Coins, unlike banknotes, are issued by the federal mint. This currency pair is an indirect quote (an indirect currency pair), which expresses the value of the national currency in the US dollar (USD).
asset-catalog_text-EUR/RUB: Euro (currency symbol - EUR) is the official currency for 17 countries of the Eurozone. Besides, it is used in 9 other countries. Eurocurrency has the largest monetary base in the world, even greater than the US dollar. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the payment for the European currency is made by the Russian rouble.
asset-catalog_text-GBP/JPY: The British pound or simply pound (currency symbol - GBP) is the national currency of the United Kingdom, as well as a legal mean of payment for the Falkland, St. Helena and Ascension Islands, as well as Tristan da Cunha and Gibraltar as UK overseas territories. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the Japanese yen is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-GBP/CHF: The British pound or simply pound (currency symbol - GBP) is the national currency of the United Kingdom, as well as a legal mean of payment for the Falkland, St. Helena and Ascension Islands, as well as Tristan da Cunha and Gibraltar as UK overseas territories. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the Swiss franc is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-AUD/CHF: The Australian dollar (AUD) is the fifth most traded currency in the world. The issuer is the Reserve Bank of Australia. It is actively used in currency exchange operations, as Australia maintains high-interest rates. Affected by the influence of trade relations with Japan, China, and the United States. Refers to "commodity" currencies, since the Australian economy depends heavily on the export of goods (in particular, gold and other metals). This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the Swiss franc is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-EUR/CAD: Euro (currency symbol - EUR) is the official currency for 17 countries of the Eurozone. Besides, it is used in 9 other countries. Eurocurrency has the largest monetary base in the world, even greater than the US dollar. Theis currency pair is a direct quotation, where the payment for the European currency is made by the Canadian dollar.
asset-catalog_text-AUD/JPY: The Australian dollar (AUD) is the fifth most traded currency in the world. The issuer is the Reserve Bank of Australia. It is actively used in currency exchange operations, as Australia maintains high-interest rates. Affected by the influence of trade relations with Japan, China, and the United States. Refers to "commodity" currencies, since the Australian economy depends heavily on the export of goods (in particular, gold and other metals). This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the Japanese yen is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-CAD/JPY: The Canadian dollar (CAD, "Loonie", "Little Dollar") is the world's seventh largest currency by trading volume. The issuer is the Bank of Canada. Affected by its neighbor - the US economy. Refers to "commodity" currencies, as the Canadian economy depends on the export of goods (in particular, energy, timber, oil). This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the Japanese yen is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-AUD/NZD: The Australian dollar (AUD) is the fifth most traded currency in the world. The issuer is the Reserve Bank of Australia. It is actively used in currency exchange operations, as Australia maintains high-interest rates. Affected by the influence of trade relations with Japan, China, and the United States. Refers to "commodity" currencies, since the Australian economy depends heavily on the export of goods (in particular, gold and other metals). This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the New Zealand dollar is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-EUR/AUD: Euro (currency symbol - EUR) is the official currency for 17 countries of the Eurozone. Besides, it is used in 9 other countries. Eurocurrency has the largest monetary base in the world, even greater than the US dollar. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the payment for the European currency is made by the Australian dollar.
asset-catalog_text-GBP/CAD: The British pound or simply pound (currency symbol - GBP) is the national currency of the United Kingdom, as well as a legal mean of payment for the Falkland, St. Helena and Ascension Islands, as well as Tristan da Cunha and Gibraltar as UK overseas territories. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the Canadian dollar is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-NZD/JPY: The New Zealand dollar (currency symbol - NZD) is the official currency of New Zealand, Niue, Cook Islands, Tokelau, and Pitcairn. Also, this currency is called "Kiwi" - this is a kind of bird and one of the symbols of New Zealand. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the Japanese yen is the accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-AUD/CAD: The Australian dollar (AUD) is the fifth most traded currency in the world. The issuer is the Reserve Bank of Australia. It is actively used in currency exchange operations, as Australia maintains high-interest rates. Affected by the influence of trade relations with Japan, China, and the United States. Refers to "commodity" currencies, since the Australian economy depends heavily on the export of goods (in particular, gold and other metals). asset-catalog_text-EUR/NZD: Euro (currency symbol - EUR) is the official currency for 17 countries of the Eurozone. Besides, it is used in 9 other countries. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the payment for the European currency is made by the New Zealand dollar.
asset-catalog_text-EUR/CHF: Euro (currency symbol - EUR) is the official currency for 17 countries of the Eurozone. Besides, it is used in 9 other countries. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the payment for the European currency is made by the Swiss franc.
asset-catalog_text-BTC/EUR: Bitcoin (BTC) is an electronic crypto-currency. To date, Bitcoin is the most popular crypto-currency. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the Euro is an accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-BTC/USD: Bitcoin (BTC) is an electronic crypto-currency. To date, Bitcoin is the most popular crypto-currency. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the US dollar is an accounting unit.
asset-catalog_text-BTC/GBP: Bitcoin (BTC) is an electronic crypto-currency. To date, Bitcoin is the most popular crypto-currency. This currency pair is a direct quotation, where the British pound is an accounting unit.

payments_bonus-usage-text1: Bonus is additional funds that are provided by the company to increase the trading potential of traders
payments_bonus-usage-text2: When making a deposit, a certain amount of bonus money may be credited to your account, size of bonus depends on the size of your deposit.
payments_bonus-usage-text3: The bonus does not limit the amount of funds that you can withdraw: you can withdraw your profits at any time as well as the amount of your deposit. Please note that when withdrawing funds, all bonus funds that were not used in trades with a x40 turnover will be assigned inactive status and will be debited from your account.
payments_hint-preface: Bonus is additional funds that are provided by the company to increase the trading potential of traders.
payments_hint-text: When making a deposit, a certain amount of bonus money may be credited to your account, size of bonus depends on the size of your deposit. The bonus does not limit the withdrawal of funds - you can withdraw profit, as well as the amount of your deposit, at any time. However, in case you withdraw part of the deposit, the unused bonus is canceled, as these funds are an addition to your deposit. To withdraw bonus funds, the turnover (the sum of all transactions, both profitable and unprofitable) must equal to the bonus multiplied by 30. The turnover starts to be calculated immediately after the bonus funds are credited. When opening transactions, we're using real funds firstly, and only then bonus ones. If the deposit had to be carried out in parts because of the limitations of payment systems, please contact support to get a total bonus. The bonus is not obligatory. You can refuse it.
payments_bonus_total: Together with the selected deposit you will receive a bonus in the amount of:

gdpr_title: Your privacy is important to us
gdpr_text:
We’re happy to announce that we’re in full compliance with GDPR meaning you get more control over data you shared with us and what we in turn to do with it.

To continue using our services in future please confirm you are consent for the processing of your personal data for any and all purposes and on all the conditions set forth in this Policy.

I have read the Data Protection Policy (hereinafter referred to as "Policy") on Your website https://binarium.com and I hereby present to the company BINARIUM LIMITED, HE 321566 (the "Company") my consent for the processing of my personal data for any and all purposes and on all the conditions set forth in this Policy.

I undertake to fulfill all the User`s obligations provided by the Policy including but not limited to the provision of an immediate notification to the Company if there are any changes to my personal data.
gdpr_disagree: I do not accept terms of private policy
cookie-request_text: By continuing to use our site, you agree to our use of cookies that ensure its proper operation.
landing-fast-trading_title-text: Earning money quickly on the Binarium trading platform is very easy
landing-fast-trading_tutorial-title: How can I earn money in 30 seconds?
landing-fast-trading_tutorial-step-1-tex: Select the future direction of the chart
landing-fast-trading_tutorial-step-2-tex: In just a few seconds you will get
landing-fast-trading_platform-info-1-tex: Practice without any risk, using all the available features.
landing-fast-trading_platform-info-2-tex: The platform that will even help a newbie easily understand how trading works.
landing-fast-trading_platform-info-3-tex: Individual classes, trading strategies, topical news.
landing-fast-trading_platform-info-4-tex: Use immediate withdrawal option and spend money as of today!
landing-success-trading_slide-1-text:
I have several income sources - business with China, Internet projects, trading. And trading is my favorite. Everything is extremely simple - I start either a bear or bull transaction, and in less than a minute I make 75-85% profit.
I particularly enjoy the trading room - it became available to me immediately after I added a 200-dollar deposit. Binarium is the only trading platform that provides its users with truly independent and profitable signals in the trading room.
landing-success-trading_slide-2-text:
I trade on Binarium platform when I have free time at work. All you need to make it happen is a computer and an Internet connection. It didn't take me long to figure out how everything works, I completed training on the platform, reviewed a few strategies, and I now get regular income from trading - greater than my paycheck.

And after work, I only dedicate my time to household chores and my family - because to me, it's the most important thing.
landing-success-trading_slide-3-text:
I have been working with Binarium for 5 years. During this time, I tried many other platforms - but only Binarium has been constantly improving and working at a stable pace all this time. Almost instantaneous withdrawals, bonuses for each deposit, and a large selection of tools.

I spend a few hours a week on the platform, and as a result I get a nice bonus to my salary. The Trends tool has also been recently introduced on the platform, and since then trading has become even easier. Technical analysis is carried out on the platform, and all I have to do is choose the strongest signals and start profitable transactions in one click.
landing-success-trading_slide-4-text:
I have been interested in cryptocurrency for a while - even before it became mainstream. I am following the market, and I would really like to make money on exchange rate fluctuations, but I had some negative experience with one exchange platform where my money was pretty much stolen.

The most important thing for me at the moment is a large income in terms of cryptocurrency assets and money safety. Binarium offers the highest interest rates for cryptocurrencies, while ensuring safety of funds by a European bank. My knowledge of the market helps, and I regularly withdraw large amounts with no problem whatsoever.

tr@subtitle: an instrument for confident and simple trading
tr@text: Customers with access to the Trading Room get effective trading signals from our top traders and earn more.
tr@signal-text1: A trading signal is an example of a profitable trade according to our traders. Signals contain an asset, the recommended price and time to enter the trade, as well as its end.
tr@signal-text2: Traders assess the strength and reliability of each signal, and you decide if you want to use our team's prediction.
tr@advice-1-text: How should you build your trading strategy? Recommendations from top traders.
tr@advice-2-text: We track all the important events that may affect your trades.
tr@advice-3-text: Learn how our team's strategies earn a profit.
tr@advice-4-text: No confusing charts: everything is clear and simple.
tr@advice-5-title: 2 trading sessions for 4 hours a day
tr@advice-5-text: Signals from Binarium traders from Monday through Thursday
tr@advice-6-text: Browser notification sounds ensure you never miss a signal.

tr@join-text: Make a deposit of $500, €500 or ₽30,000. The deposit amount will remain in your account. Use it to earn even more with Binarium.

tradeback@text: Binarium supports its users by compensating part of their losses. Tradeback is a tool to recoup part of your losing trades. It's credited to your account every Tuesday for the previous week's transactions.

BG6265@slide-1-text: Binarium offers a wide range of assets, from currency pairs to cryptocurrencies. It has assets that other platforms just don't offer. I especially want to note the ability to trade on weekends.
BG6265@slide-2-text: I started trading with Binarium. I quickly figured out how it works. It has a great support team and lots of useful tools. I love that you can level up your account over time and get more privileges.
BG6265@slide-3-text: Thanks to Binarium, I learned how to manage my capital and invest wisely.
BG6265@slide-4-text: It's the best platform that never stands still. They add new assets, hold drawings, and let you withdraw profits even quicker. Thank you for the opportunity to make money.
BG6265@slide-5-text: The best platform ever! It's easy to trade, even for beginners. You can quickly withdraw your profits, and the support team is quick to help. I really like the trading room and traders' tips. Thank you Binarium, I wish you good luck and success.
BG6265@slide-6-text: I want to thank Binarium for their professionalism and high-quality product. I don't anything to complain about in the almost 3 years I've been using the platform. Everything is easy to understand, fast, and top notch.
BG6265@slide-7-text: Thank you for the opportunity to earn money. The user-friendly design, fast withdrawal, tournaments with real money prizes, high % of payments, and the ability to trade on the weekend are the top pros. I definitely recommend it.
